#
# Auto-generated cmake build file for guvision_utils
#
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
project(guvision_utils CXX)
enable_testing()
find_package(gu_util CONFIG REQUIRED)
include( GNUInstallDirs )
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED True)
add_compile_definitions()
include_directories($<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}>/./ $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}> $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}>/.. $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}>/.. $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/guvision_utils> ../../Common $<BUILD_INTERFACE:/include/gu_util> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include/gu_util> /usr/local/include/gu_util /usr/local/include)
link_directories(/usr/local/lib)
add_library(libguvision_utils SHARED math_fnc.cpp CoordinateController.cc CoordinateGateway.cc EdgeController.cc EdgeGateway.cc)
add_library(libguvision_utilsStatic STATIC math_fnc.cpp CoordinateController.cc CoordinateGateway.cc EdgeController.cc EdgeGateway.cc)
set_target_properties(libguvision_utils PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME guvision_utils)
set_target_properties(libguvision_utilsStatic PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME guvision_utils)
set_property(TARGET libguvision_utils PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 1)
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}")
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}")
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}")
set(CMAKE_SKIP_BUILD_RPATH FALSE)
set(CMAKE_BUILD_WITH_INSTALL_RPATH FALSE)
set(CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH TRUE)
set(CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib;/usr/local/lib")
target_include_directories(libguvision_utils INTERFACE $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}>/./ $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}> $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}>/.. $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}>/.. $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/guvision_utils>)
target_include_directories(libguvision_utils PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/guvision_utils>)
target_link_libraries(libguvision_utils gu_util)
include(CMakePackageConfigHelpers)
configure_package_config_file(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Config.cmake.in "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guvision_utilsConfig.cmake" INSTALL_DESTINATION "lib/cmake/guvision_utils" NO_SET_AND_CHECK_MACRO NO_CHECK_REQUIRED_COMPONENTS_MACRO )
write_basic_package_version_file( "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guvision_utilsConfigVersion.cmake" VERSION "1.0" COMPATIBILITY AnyNewerVersion )
install(TARGETS libguvision_utils libguvision_utilsStatic DESTINATION lib EXPORT guvision_utils)
install(FILES CoordinateController.h CoordinateGateway.h EdgeController.h EdgeGateway.h SimpleShapes.h Trig.h math_fnc.h DESTINATION include/guvision_utils)
install(EXPORT guvision_utils FILE guvision_utils.cmake DESTINATION lib/cmake/guvision_utils )
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guvision_utilsConfig.cmake ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guvision_utilsConfigVersion.cmake DESTINATION lib/cmake/guvision_utils )
export(EXPORT guvision_utils FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guvision_utils.cmake" )
